creator: chorweng@alpsoft-tech.com
text:
HI!
  the version of tomcat i am using is 5.5.4.  after sending multiple requests to
my web app, tomcat crashed.  when i want to start it up again (via monitor
tomcat program), it cannot be started. tomcat cannot be restarted even after i
have rebooted the server.  this error will go away if i reinstall tomcat. this
error is reproduceable.  i only encounter this when tomcat has high loads.
thanks


the stderr.log is as follows
=======================================

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I cannot reproduce this. The error would indicate some sort of problem where
Tomcat JARs are corrupted, and could only be caused by either the OS or the JVM.
Please post on tomcat-user about this.
